io.cloudex.framework.cloud.api

Interface CloudService


  • public interface CloudService
    An interface for cloud API operations. This is generic and is not cloud provider specific. Implementations are needed for the various cloud providers
    Author:
    Omer Dawelbeit (omerio)

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • init

        VmMetaData init()
         throws IOException
        Perform any required initialization before this cloud service is used
        Throws:
        IOException - if any of the cloud api calls fail

      • getMetaData

        VmMetaData getMetaData(boolean waitForChange)
                throws IOException
        Get the meta data of the current instance, Wait for change will block until there is a change
        Parameters:
        waitForChange - - true to block until there is a change, false to return immediately
        Returns:
        VmMetaData
        Throws:
        IOException - if any of the cloud api calls fail

      • getMetaData

        VmMetaData getMetaData(String instanceId,
                       String zoneId)
                throws IOException
        Get the meta data for the provided instance id
        Parameters:
        instanceId - - the id of the vm instance
        zoneId - - the zone or region id
        Returns:
        VmMetaData
        Throws:
        IOException - if any of the cloud api calls fail

      • updateMetadata

        void updateMetadata(VmMetaData metaData)
             throws IOException
        Update the meta data of the current instance.
        Parameters:
        metaData - VmMetaData
        Throws:
        IOException - if any of the cloud api calls fail

      • updateMetadata

        String updateMetadata(VmMetaData metaData,
                      String zoneId,
                      String instanceId,
                      boolean block)
               throws IOException
        Update the meta data of the the provided instance
        Parameters:
        metaData - VmMetaData
        zoneId - - the zone or region id
        instanceId - - the id of the vm instance
        block - - true to wait for the api call to complete, false to return immediately
        Throws:
        IOException - if any of the cloud api calls fail

      • blockOnComputeOperations

        void blockOnComputeOperations(List<String> references,
                              String zoneId)
                       throws IOException
        Block and wait the operations with the provided references to complete
        Parameters:
        references - - the operations references
        zoneId - - the zone or region id
        Throws:
        IOException - if any of the cloud api calls fail

      • startInstance

        boolean startInstance(List<VmConfig> configs,
                      boolean block)
               throws IOException
        Create VM instances, optionally block until all are created. If any fails then the returned flag is false
        Parameters:
        configs - - the VmConfig of the instances to start
        block - - true to wait for all the instance to start up
        Returns:
        true if the operation is successful
        Throws:
        IOException - if any of the cloud api calls fail

      • shutdownInstance

        void shutdownInstance(List<VmConfig> configs)
               throws IOException
        Delete the VMs provided in this config
        Parameters:
        configs - - the VmConfig of the instances to shutdown
        Throws:
        IOException - if any of the cloud api calls fail

      • shutdownInstance

        void shutdownInstance()
               throws IOException
        Delete the currently running vm, i.e. self terminate
        Throws:
        IOException - if any of the cloud api calls fail

                              String location)
                       throws IOException

        Parameters:
        bucket - - the cloud storage bucket
        location - - the location where the bucket should be created
        Throws:
        IOException - if any of the cloud api calls fail

      • uploadFileToCloudStorage

        StorageObject uploadFileToCloudStorage(String filename,
                                       String bucket,
                                       Callback callback)
                                throws IOException
        Upload the provided file into cloud storage
        Parameters:
        filename - - the name of the file to upload
        bucket - - the cloud bucket
        callback - - an optional callback when the upload is done
        Returns:
        a StorageObject
        Throws:
        IOException - if any of the cloud api calls fail

      • uploadFileToCloudStorage

        StorageObject uploadFileToCloudStorage(String filename,
                                       String bucket)
                                throws IOException
        Upload a file to cloud storage and block until it's uploaded
        Parameters:
        filename - - the name of the file to upload
        bucket - - the cloud storage bucket
        Returns:
        a StorageObject of the uploaded file
        Throws:
        IOException - if any of the cloud api calls fail

      • downloadObjectFromCloudStorage

        void downloadObjectFromCloudStorage(String object,
                                    String outFile,
                                    String bucket,
                                    Callback callback)
                             throws IOException
        Download an object from cloud storage to a file
        Parameters:
        object - - the name of the object to download
        outFile - - the local file to save the object
        bucket - - the cloud storage bucket
        callback - - call when the operation completes
        Throws:
        IOException - if any of the cloud api calls fail

      • downloadObjectFromCloudStorage

        void downloadObjectFromCloudStorage(String object,
                                    String outFile,
                                    String bucket)
                             throws IOException
        Download an object from cloud storage to a file, this method will block until the file is downloaded
        Parameters:
        object - - the name of the object to download
        outFile - - the local file to save the object
        bucket - - the cloud storage bucket
        Throws:
        IOException - if any of the cloud api calls fail

      • loadLocalFilesIntoBigData

        List<String> loadLocalFilesIntoBigData(List<String> files,
                                       BigDataTable table,
                                       boolean createTable)
                                throws IOException
        Load a list of local files into a big data table
        Parameters:
        files - - the names of the local files to upload to big data
        table - - the table definition
        createTable - - true if a new table should be created if it doesn't exist
        Returns:
        a List of all the job ids
        Throws:
        IOException - if any of the cloud api calls fail

      • startBigDataQuery

        String startBigDataQuery(String querySql)
                  throws IOException
        Creates an asynchronous Query Job for a particular query on a dataset
        Parameters:
        querySql - the actual query string
        Returns:
        a reference to the inserted query job
        Throws:
        IOException - if any of the cloud api calls fail

      • startBigDataQuery

        String startBigDataQuery(String querySql,
                         BigDataTable table)
                  throws IOException
        Creates an asynchronous Query Job for a particular query on a dataset. If a table is supplied then large results are stored in a new temporary table with the table name driven from the supplied table
        Parameters:
        querySql - the actual query string
        table - the table being queried
        Returns:
        a reference to the inserted query job
        Throws:
        IOException - if any of the cloud api calls fail

      • saveBigQueryResultsToFile

        QueryStats saveBigQueryResultsToFile(String jobId,
                                     String filename)
                              throws IOException
        TODO rename to BigData Polls a big data job and once done save the results to a file
        Parameters:
        jobId - - the id of a previous big data job
        filename - - the destination filename
        Throws:
        IOException - if any of the cloud api calls fail

      • saveBigQueryResultsToFile

        QueryStats saveBigQueryResultsToFile(String jobId,
                                     String filename,
                                     String bucket,
                                     Integer minFiles,
                                     int directDownloadRowLimit)
                              throws IOException
        TODO rename to BigData Polls a big data job and once done save the results to a file
        Parameters:
        jobId - - the id of a previous big data job
        filename - - the destination filename
        bucket - - the cloud storage bucket
        minFiles - - the minimum number of files to create
        directDownloadRowLimit - - the limit to use for direct download, large than this limit will use export to cloud storage
        Throws:
        IOException - if any of the cloud api calls fail

      • saveBigQueryResultsToCloudStorage

        QueryStats saveBigQueryResultsToCloudStorage(String jobId,
                                             String bucket,
                                             String filename)
                                      throws IOException
        TODO rename to BigData Polls a big data job and once done exports the results to a cloud storage file then download it
        Parameters:
        jobId - - the id of a previous big data job
        filename - - the destination filename
        bucket - - the cloud storage bucket
        Throws:
        IOException - if any of the cloud api calls fail

      • getMaximumMetaDataSize

        int getMaximumMetaDataSize()
        Return the maximum metadata size for the underlying cloud provider implementation
        Returns:
        maximum metadata size

      • getApiRecheckDelay

        int getApiRecheckDelay()
        Get the sleep period in seconds when waiting for async API operations to complete
        Returns:
        API recheck delay

      • setRemote

        void setRemote(boolean remote)
        Usually this cloud service is used in a cloud VM environment. If remote is set to true, then it's assumed that this service is not run on a VM environment. Useful for local testing of cloud services
        Parameters:
        remote - - true if this instance is not running on a VM

      • setAuthenticationProvider

        <T> void setAuthenticationProvider(AuthenticationProvider<T> provider)
        The authentication provider used by this instance
        Type Parameters:
        T - the class of the authentication object returned by the provider
        Parameters:
        provider - the authentication provider to use
